text: 6.2: Zo 7.15Ana ndav Sabat raa hɨgim, ana Fhe Bakɨme buni mbararagi phena vhen vergap, Fhe Bakɨme buni vhuuin mbe nzuai. Gumgi gu mbigi vhɨrve ana buni mbararav ŋgava mbatɨga mbui. Mbe ŋgava mbatɨga mbuav nzai, “Kha guma maaŋ kha buni ndigi? Kha guma maaŋ kha khesharigi ndɨkndɨga vhuuŋ ndigi? Ana vhɨra maaŋ kha mirikori ga mbui ŋkasŋka ndigi?
